title: Is smoking worth it?
creator_credit: Myron Solin and American Cancer Society
brief_description: Shows four teenagers discussing why they do or do not smoke. Presents factual evidence linking cigarette smoking with lung cancer. Discusses the difficulty of giving up the habit of smoking. Suitable for secondary level.
description: Shows four teenagers discussing why they do or do not smoke. Presents factual evidence linking cigarette smoking with lung cancer. Discusses the difficulty of giving up the habit of smoking. Suitable for secondary level.
